description: The image captures two monkeys sitting on a road, likely in a wildlife park. One monkey is grooming the other, picking at its fur, a common social behavior among primates. The background features a lush green landscape with trees and a few scattered structures, suggesting a rural or park setting. The viewpoint suggests the photo was taken from inside a vehicle, adding a layer of safe observation for the viewer.
poem:
Two monkeys on the road do sit,
In grooming session, bit by bit.
With trees around in tranquil air,
They pluck and clean with utmost care.
A peaceful scene, in nature knit.
